tribe_name: Biker, see also Motorcycle clubs and Outlaw motorcycle clubs

"Fairy" subculture, related to the "Queer" subculture. Homosexuals who showed their homosexuality publicly by being effeminate. Originated in Western societies at the end of the 19th and beginning of the 20th century
